region_description: Lyon, known as the gastronomic capital of France, is a city that delights food lovers and culture enthusiasts alike. With its rich history dating back to Roman times, Lyon boasts a stunning blend of Renaissance and modern architecture. The city's historic center, Vieux Lyon, is a UNESCO World Heritage Site filled with narrow streets, traboules (hidden passageways), and beautiful squares. Visitors can indulge in world-class cuisine, explore local markets, and enjoy vibrant cultural events throughout the year.
